message: Only shin and Rei are brothers. Kiri isn't. They're just part of the same Nouzen clan ;--; how is that confusing. That scene where they are all together is simply what Frederica imagined.. it's the scenario that would've happened if both Kiri and Rei were alive aling with Shin.

guys i am sorry but i need an explanation for the main plot asap plss like the whole war thing, the republic, Nouzen family and how the f did they get attacked, how can someone's brain be in a juggernaut no but how even did the legion get hands on them p ls that would be very appreciated

War: The countries are fighting against an empty shell of the Empire of Giad which declared war against the other countries after developing the Legion. Following the declaration of war, the Giadian Empire had mysteriously fallen while the Legion is still carrying out their previous orders of war.
